name: Cassandra Church
description: A small yet solemn church in Cassandra, built in a cruciform layout. Despite its modest size, the building carries an oppressive and unsettling atmosphere. The church is normally closed, quiet, and seemingly abandoned, but hides profound secrets beneath its sacred façade.

snapshot.name: The Church
snapshot.location: A cruciform church with a tall main door, central nave, altar, bell tower, and stained-glass windows
snapshot.description: The church features a four-meter-high main entrance that inspires awe before entry. Inside, the building forms a cross shape. At the deepest end stands a crucifix of Jesus Christ. Behind it rises a bell tower, backed by a massive stained-glass window. Above the tower is a domed ceiling that deepens the sense of depth and silence. The interior is usually quiet, with faint echoes and an unnatural stillness.

characters.name: Constantine
characters.location: Inside the church, usually near the altar or reading the Bible
characters.notes: Appears calm and devout, but is secretly influenced by Atlach-Nacha. He claims to have been in the church at specific times and subtly pressures investigators to leave, stating the church is closed.

characters.name: Three Mysterious Visitors
characters.notes: Dressed similarly to Ben. They are dismissed by Constantine, who refuses to explain their relationship to him.

clues.clueText: The church bell shows signs of incorrect time despite being crafted by a master clockmaker.
Hidden trapdoor concealed within the church, behind signs of spider activity.
reveals: Access to hidden structures beneath the church

clues.clueText: A massive web woven by Atlach-Nacha connects the church to the Dreamlands.
reveals: Cold spiders entering the real world

clues.clueText: Black spiders are occasionally seen roaming the church after certain investigations.
reveals: Connection between the church and spider-related infections

conditions.description: Dim natural light filtered through stained-glass windows.
Oppressive silence, broken only by faint echoes.

events: Discovery of time discrepancy in the bell
Appearance of black spiders after hospital investigation
Potential discovery of hidden door and underground secrets

exits.description: Large front doors of the church
Concealed passage behind the church interior

snapshot.keeperNotes: The church is a key nexus of Atlach-Nacha’s influence. Constantine believes himself a priest but is deeply compromised. The church evolves based on investigator progress, especially after hospital revelations.
permanentChanges: Once discovered, spider presence in the church becomes persistent
The hidden trapdoor remains known to investigators

connections.description: Discovering the truth about Constantine and spiders in the hospital enables further developments in the church.
A hidden passage beneath the church connects to the underground casino.
The clockmaker White provides insight into the abnormal bell mechanism.
